text:
When model_proxy_http handle url with Chinese  by UTF-8 character set, it encode incorrectly.
for example:
request url:
local/Rayco-%E9%99%88%E7%A7%80%E6%A2%85-20100329
proxy handled:
local:5080/Rayco-\xe9\x99\x88\xe7\xa7\x80\xe6\xa2\x85-20100329

When I use model_proxy_http 2.2.9, it work correctly.
creator: benewu@gmail.com

text:
You could find the exact 2.2.x release where the behavior changed.  (I can't tell from CHANGES what would have caused this change.  Are any other developers aware of recent changes related to URL encoding?)

Win32 binaries for 2.2.10-2.2.13 are available at http://archive.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/
creator: trawick@apache.org
